com.github.mlefeb01.spigotutils.plugin.customitem.upgradableitem

Class AbstractUpgradableItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mlefeb01.spigotutils.plugin.customitem.AbstractCustomItem
      • com.github.mlefeb01.spigotutils.plugin.customitem.upgradableitem.AbstractUpgradableItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Named

    public abstract class AbstractUpgradableItem
extends AbstractCustomItem
    Extension of AbstractCustomItem that provides functionality for upgradable items. This is useful for custom items that are more complex then regular custom items, generally having the following attributes - Upgrades - Updating meta (varying frequencies) - Persistent data not stored on the item

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The NBT key used to map the items data uuid to the item
